title: Personal Papers
copy: These records from outside sources consist of the personal papers of individuals related in some way to the history of the Art Institute, people closely associated with the institution, or the collections. Similar materials that have no association with the Art Institute have been transferred to the Ryerson and Burnham Archives of the Ryerson and Burnham Libraries. Bartlett, Frederic Clay (1873–1953) Artist, teacher, donor, and trustee Blake, Margaret Day Donor, trustee, and founder of the Woman's Board Chassaing, Edouard and Olga Artists and teachers Gardner, Helen (1878–1946) Teacher Halstead, Whitney (1926–1978) Teacher and biographer of Joseph Yoakum (1886–1972) Harding, George (1868–1939) Collector and founder of the Harding Museum Schniewind, Carl (1900–1957) Curator Taft, Lorado (1860–1936) Artist and teacher Tyler, Alice Kellogg (1866–1900) Teacher Ufer, Walter (1876–1936) Artist Wade, Caroline (1857–1943) Artist and teacher
